review: once in a while a game comes around that is truly beautiful. when my dumb friend bought this for me, i honestly thought it would be terrible..............oh how i was wrong. the game has one of the most heart wrenching and meaningful stories in any game i have played and adds humour to help from the intensity of its story. its twists and turns will have you crying tears of joy, and sadness, and youll want to keep playing more 9.5/10(puzzles could have varied)

this game is like a fresh batch of brownies. you take a bite and think 'this is good' they you realise it has some gooey chocolate chips inside and your like 'no way it gets better' then you like eat the rest of the brownies and die because the games so good i could eat it out.
